column2: or The Valley of the Tombs
column3: was located between the southwest and southeast ridges of the Mountain Meneltarma on the island of Númenor.  The shallow valley held the tombs of the Kings of Númenor
column4: cut into the rock of the mountain.  In Noirinan was also the spring of the river Siril
column5: the main course of water which flowed across the island of Númenor.
